name: Anno - The Block Runner
description:
Enter the Oculus and take control of Anno, a next generation cyborg, in it's journey through a new world!

Jump and slide your way through a harrowing adventure as you attempt to collect the most points and survive the longest!

Test your reflexes as you race your way past blocks, collect tokens and try to survive a world that constantly speeds up!

Be careful! You only have a certain amount of lives! After you have run out of lives, you must cooldown and wait for a new Anno to be created!

Every Anno gets stronger after they are re-spawned, keep playing to get more lives!

Join your friends in the never ending competition to survive the longest and collect the most points!

Stay tuned for more games and updates!

Thank you for all of your support!

More games can be found at
https://www.fractuminnovations.com/the-oculus
or my developer page found here

https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=7634157798081145849&hl=en_US

Suppport can be found at
https://www.fractuminnovations.com/support
